title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the perfect mouse for all your needs. With its convenient trackball design, this mouse is easy to use and navigate, making it ideal for elderly folks who may be easily confused.

This trackball mouse offers versatile connectivity options, allowing you to connect it to your computer via PS/2 or USB. It features a DPI of 300, ensuring smooth and precise cursor control. Choose from a range of colors including red, gray, and white to match your personal style.

The dimensions of this mouse are 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, making it comfortable to hold and use. Its trackball feature allows you to navigate with ease, while the side-to-side scrolling feature enhances your browsing experience.

With two buttons, this mouse provides simple and intuitive control. It is suitable for both left-handed and right-handed individuals, ensuring everyone can use it comfortably. This mouse is proudly made in China, guaranteeing its quality and durability.

Upgrade your computer experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Its user-friendly design and easy-to-use features make it the perfect choice for elderly folks. Don't miss out on this exceptional product!

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is suitable for both left-handed and right-handed individuals, ensuring comfort and ease of use for everyone. It is made with high-quality materials and is manufactured in China.
